pages.title: Seven-Phase Model
pages.text: The protocol follows a staged escalation model from subtle environmental drift to direct confrontation and reality decay. If you can identify the current phase, you can choose the right response profile.

pages.title: Response Rule
pages.text: When a new anomaly appears, reduce risk first and investigate second. Lock down supplies, mark your current location, then test whether the anomaly repeats. False certainty is the Watcher's strongest weapon.
Continue into the detailed phase sections.
